history.proof: intros a p' p H. unfold taille_1, taille_0. unfold prec_in_state in H. simpl in H. destruct H as [c H]. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

original: intros a p' p H. unfold taille_1, taille_0. unfold prec_in_state in H. simpl in H. destruct H as [c H]. rewrite H. induction p. - apply Nat.le_refl. - simpl. apply Nat.le_trans with (m := S(taille_0 p1 + taille_0 p0)). + apply Nat.le_succ_l. + apply Nat.add_le_mono; apply IHp0 || apply IHp1.
